item.description:
I've so enjoyed our past parties and I've heard from many of you that you have too!

Let's do it again and celebrate the Holiday's together!  Please note that this event is a FRIDAY night. :)

This party is for all of my meetups – a great chance to cross-pollinate! And from the feedback I've been getting everyone is really enjoying such an eclectic mix! You never know what creativity, innovation and provocative thoughts can come from the mix of entrepreneurship, arts, sustainability, spirituality and even eros!

For those of you that are single – wear a sticker on your badge to show your interest in meeting other singles. Join us for some great company, stimulating conversation and maybe even some groovy moves!

Also a great low risk way to meet others from the group if you haven't yet been to an event!

We are lucky to have DJ Alkemi (also a great financial planner!) providing the tunes for the night. He's open to requests!

Please Bring:

1). $10 to contribute towards the expenses of the night (if you can pay online its really helpful because of the upfront costs...but you are welcome to contribute at the door.)

2.) Something to share such as a bottle of wine, appetizer or dessert (no chips or bread unless part of an appetizer please!) Your contributions are very appreciated!! (If you are unable to contribute for financial reasons please come anyway.) :)

Loose Schedule:

Conversation, Networking, General Schmoozing: 7:30pm

Dancing and General Merriment: 8:30 to 12am

Hanging out: 12am til….

Hope you can make it!

Feel free to call Â Â Â 413-320-3991Â or email me at trish@trishblain.com if you have any questions.  Feel free to bring friends or significant others!!!
item.name: Holiday House Party
